ruins_q1_investigate.name: Investigate the Disturbance
ruins_q1_investigate.description: Rellan the Quartermaster heard unsettling echoes below. Investigate the Entrance Hall and report back.

steps.description: Use SEARCH in the Entrance Hall to examine the area.
Return to the Quartermaster with your findings.

ruins_q2_keepers_journal.name: The Keeper's Journal
ruins_q2_keepers_journal.description: Collect the three journal fragments scattered through the ruins.

steps.objective: Find a fragment in the Fountain Court
Find a fragment in the Cross-Reference Hall
Find a fragment in the Warded Quadrant
Assemble the journal at the Archive Gate
steps.description: Bring the fragments to the Archive Gate.

ruins_q3_cleanse.name: Cleanse the Chambers
ruins_q3_cleanse.description: Defeat the threats sustaining corruption in the ruins.

steps.description: Confront the entity at the Grand Crossing.
Break their coordination in the Central Chambers.
Banish the demonic presence in the Deep Vaults.

ruins_q4_seal_vault.name: Seal the Vault
ruins_q4_seal_vault.description: Confront the Vault Guardian and choose how to seal the Vault.

steps.description: Fight or reconfigure the warding core.
Choose: cleanse, repurpose, or harness the Vault.
